about_the_game:
The game allows you to experience an incredibly satisfying shooting experience, immersing yourself in the joy of shooting zombies. However, be careful not to harm humans in the zombie horde.
Show off your shooting skills, survive in extreme situations, and become the last survivor in the post-apocalyptic world!
The game offers as many as dozens of different firearm fusions and upgrades, allowing you to achieve personalized weapon strikes.
If you feel powerful enough, challenge mode may provide a higher level of difficulty for a more exciting combat experience.
detailed_description:
The game allows you to experience an incredibly satisfying shooting experience, immersing yourself in the joy of shooting zombies. However, be careful not to harm humans in the zombie horde.
Show off your shooting skills, survive in extreme situations, and become the last survivor in the post-apocalyptic world!
The game offers as many as dozens of different firearm fusions and upgrades, allowing you to achieve personalized weapon strikes.
If you feel powerful enough, challenge mode may provide a higher level of difficulty for a more exciting combat experience.
name: Last Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8.1,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E4500 or equivalent,AMD athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEforce 7300 GT(512MB)，Radeon X1300 Pro(256MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7,8.1,10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo E6750 or equivalent,AMD athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 5000+ or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEforce 8600 GT(512MB)，Radeon HD 4650Pro(1024MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: In the game, you will experience an incredibly satisfying adrenaline rush that will leave you wanting more. However, be sure not to harm innocent humans in the zombie horde. Survive in the post-apocalyptic world, show off your amazing shooting skills, and become the last survivor!
